statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(value) FROM sensor_data;
SELECT AVG(value) FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_id FROM sensor_data;
SELECT id, value FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT MIN(value) FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 100 AND sensor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-02-15' AND value < 50;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(value) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT id, value FROM sensor_data ORDER BY value ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(value) AS average_value, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 4 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 5 AND value > 75;
SELECT MIN(value) AS min_value, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 6;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, sensor_id, value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(value) > 50;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_id FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 100;
SELECT id, value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, timestamp, value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND value < 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM sensor_data WHERE value < 10 GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT sensor_id, MIN(value) AS min_value, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 2, 3) GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 4 OR sensor_id = 5;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-04-01' GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) < 50;
SELECT id, value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 6 AND timestamp < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY avg_value DESC;
SELECT id, value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-04-01' AND '2022-04-30' AND value > 75;
SELECT sensor_id, SUM(value) AS total_value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-03-01' GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING SUM(value) > 500;
SELECT id, timestamp, value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 7 AND timestamp > '2022-05-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, MIN(value) AS min_value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-06-01' GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING MIN(value) < 25;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5, 7);
SELECT AVG(value) AS overall_avg_value FROM sensor_data;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT location FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name LIKE 'humidity%';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY reading DESC;
SELECT AVG(reading) AS avg_reading FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE reading > 50;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE location = 'Room A' AND sensor_type = 'pressure';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sensors FROM sensor_data WHERE location = 'Lab';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'humidity' OR sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensor_data WHERE reading BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT MIN(reading) AS min_reading, MAX(reading) AS max_reading FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name NOT LIKE '%_sensor';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type IN ('temperature', 'humidity');
SELECT AVG(reading) AS avg_reading, MAX(reading) AS max_reading FROM sensor_data WHERE location = 'Room B';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensor_data WHERE reading = (SELECT MIN(reading) FROM sensor_data);
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, reading, location FROM sensor_data WHERE reading = (SELECT MAX(reading) FROM sensor_data);
SELECT * FROM energy_optimization WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT optimization_name, efficiency_score FROM energy_optimization WHERE optimization_type = 'lighting';
SELECT AVG(efficiency_score) AS avg_efficiency_score FROM energy_optimization WHERE optimization_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE reading > 100
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature'
SELECT sensor_name, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE location = 'Room A' ORDER BY reading DESC
SELECT AVG(reading) AS average_reading FROM sensor_data
SELECT COUNT(sensor_id) AS total_sensors FROM sensor_data
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE reading BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, sensor_type FROM sensor_data WHERE location LIKE '%Hall%'
SELECT sensor_name, location, sensor_type, MAX(reading) AS max_reading FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'humidity' ORDER BY reading
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE reading IN (SELECT MAX(reading) FROM sensor_data)
SELECT sensor_name, location, sensor_type, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE reading < (SELECT AVG(reading) FROM sensor_data)
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE location LIKE '%Floor%' AND sensor_type = 'pressure'
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, sensor_type, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name LIKE '%Sensor%' OR location = 'Room B'
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, sensor_type, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE reading > (SELECT AVG(reading) FROM sensor_data)
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name IN ('Sensor1', 'Sensor2', 'Sensor3')
SELECT sensor_name, location, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE reading > (SELECT AVG(reading) FROM sensor_data) ORDER BY reading
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, sensor_type, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type IN ('temperature', 'humidity')
SELECT sensor_name, location, sensor_type, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' OR location = 'Room C' ORDER BY reading DESC
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name <> 'Sensor1' AND location <> 'Basement'
SELECT sensor_name, location, sensor_type, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE reading = (SELECT MIN(reading) FROM sensor_data)
SELECT * FROM SensorData LIMIT 10
SELECT id, timestamp FROM SensorData WHERE reading > 50
SELECT * FROM SensorMetadata WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature'
SELECT MAX(energy_saved) FROM EnergyPatterns
SELECT AVG(reading) FROM SensorData
SELECT location, sensor_type FROM SensorMetadata WHERE installation_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description FROM EnergyPatterns
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(timestamp) FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id
SELECT AVG(energy_saved) FROM EnergyPatterns WHERE energy_saved > 100
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM SensorMetadata
SELECT MIN(reading) FROM SensorData
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(reading) FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id
SELECT * FROM SensorMetadata WHERE location LIKE '%London%'
SELECT * FROM EnergyPatterns WHERE energy_saved < 50
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type FROM SensorMetadata
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM SensorData
SELECT SUM(energy_saved) FROM EnergyPatterns
SELECT * FROM EnergyPatterns WHERE pattern_description LIKE '%light%'
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND reading > 50
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, reading FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT sensor_id, installation_date FROM SensorMetadata WHERE location = 'Building A'
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, installation_date FROM SensorMetadata WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature'
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type FROM SensorMetadata WHERE installation_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description FROM EnergyPatterns WHERE energy_saved > 100
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, reading, location FROM SensorData JOIN SensorMetadata ON SensorData.sensor_id = SensorMetadata.sensor_id
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, reading, location FROM SensorData INNER JOIN SensorMetadata USING(sensor_id)
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type, installation_date FROM SensorMetadata JOIN SensorData USING(sensor_id)
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type, installation_date FROM SensorMetadata INNER JOIN SensorData ON SensorMetadata.sensor_id = SensorData.sensor_id
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, reading, location, pattern_description FROM SensorData JOIN EnergyPatterns ON SensorData.sensor_id = EnergyPatterns.pattern_id
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, reading, location, pattern_description FROM SensorData INNER JOIN EnergyPatterns USING(sensor_id)
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type, installation_date, energy_saved FROM SensorMetadata JOIN SensorData USING(sensor_id) JOIN EnergyPatterns ON SensorData.sensor_id = EnergyPatterns.pattern_id
SELECT s.sensor_id, s.timestamp, s.reading, m.location, m.sensor_type FROM SensorData s JOIN SensorMetadata m ON s.sensor_id = m.sensor_id WHERE s.reading > 50 AND m.sensor_type = 'Temperature'

SELECT s.sensor_id, s.timestamp, s.reading, m.location, m.sensor_type, e.energy_saved FROM SensorData s JOIN SensorMetadata m ON s.sensor_id = m.sensor_id JOIN EnergyPatterns e ON s.sensor_id = e.pattern_id WHERE s.timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM SensorData;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM SensorData;
SELECT MAX(data_value) FROM SensorData;
SELECT MIN(data_value) FROM SensorData;
SELECT AVG(data_value) FROM SensorData;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SensorData;
SELECT * FROM SensorLocation;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM SensorLocation;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT sensor_id, consumption_value FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT SUM(consumption_value) FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT * FROM EnergyOptimization;
SELECT sensor_id, optimization_strategy FROM EnergyOptimization;
SELECT sensor_id, date FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT sensor_id, date, consumption_value FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT sensor_id, optimization_strategy FROM EnergyOptimization WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM SensorLocation WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, data_value FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 2;
SELECT sensor_id, date, consumption_value FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location, date, consumption_value FROM SensorLocation JOIN EnergyConsumption ON SensorLocation.sensor_id = EnergyConsumption.sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE data_value > 100
SELECT AVG(data_value) FROM SensorData
SELECT MAX(data_value) AS max_value FROM SensorData
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 100
SELECT * FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_id, SUM(data_value) AS total_value FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id
SELECT * FROM SensorLocation WHERE location LIKE '%room%'
SELECT * FROM SensorLocation WHERE sensor_id IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM SensorData WHERE data_value > 200)
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumption_value > 50 AND date = '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM EnergyOptimization WHERE optimization_strategy = 'automatic'
SELECT * FROM SensorData JOIN EnergyConsumption ON SensorData.sensor_id = EnergyConsumption.sensor_id
SELECT MAX(data_value) AS max_value, location FROM SensorData INNER JOIN SensorLocation ON SensorData.sensor_id = SensorLocation.sensor_id GROUP BY location
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(consumption_value) AS avg_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY sensor_id
SELECT * FROM EnergyOptimization WHERE sensor_id IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM SensorData WHERE data_value > 150)
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE data_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT sensor_id, MIN(data_value) AS min_value FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-01-31'
SELECT * FROM SensorLocation WHERE sensor_id NOT IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM SensorData)
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT location) AS location_count FROM SensorLocation
SELECT * FROM SensorData;
SELECT sensor_type, timestamp FROM SensorData;
SELECT id, timestamp, value FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, power_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE power_consumed > 100;
SELECT * FROM RoomInfo;
SELECT room_name, total_power_consumed FROM RoomInfo WHERE total_power_consumed < 500;
SELECT * FROM SensorLocations;
SELECT sensor_id, room_id, floor_number FROM SensorLocations WHERE floor_number = 2;
SELECT * FROM EnergyPatterns;
SELECT pattern_name, analysis_result FROM EnergyPatterns;
SELECT * FROM SensorData JOIN EnergyConsumption ON SensorData.id = EnergyConsumption.sensor_id;
SELECT SensorData.sensor_type, EnergyConsumption.power_consumed FROM SensorData JOIN EnergyConsumption ON SensorData.id = EnergyConsumption.sensor_id WHERE EnergyConsumption.power_consumed > 200;
SELECT * FROM RoomInfo JOIN SensorLocations ON RoomInfo.room_id = SensorLocations.room_id;
SELECT RoomInfo.room_name, SensorLocations.floor_number FROM RoomInfo JOIN SensorLocations ON RoomInfo.room_id = SensorLocations.room_id WHERE SensorLocations.floor_number = 1;
SELECT * FROM SensorData UNION SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT id, sensor_id, pattern_name FROM EnergyConsumption, EnergyPatterns WHERE EnergyConsumption.sensor_id = EnergyPatterns.pattern_id;
SELECT * FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT room_id, COUNT(sensor_id) AS num_sensors FROM SensorLocations GROUP BY room_id;
SELECT AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'humidity';
SELECT MAX(total_power_consumed) AS max_power FROM RoomInfo;
SELECT AVG(power_consumed) AS avg_power FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(power_consumed) > 150;
SELECT * FROM SensorData
SELECT sensor_type, value FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT room_name, total_power_consumed FROM RoomInfo
SELECT pattern_name, analysis_result FROM EnergyPatterns
SELECT SensorData.sensor_type, EnergyPatterns.analysis_result FROM SensorData JOIN EnergyPatterns ON SensorData.id = EnergyPatterns.pattern_id
SELECT SensorData.id, SensorData.timestamp, EnergyConsumption.power_consumed FROM SensorData JOIN EnergyConsumption ON SensorData.id = EnergyConsumption.sensor_id

SELECT SensorData.sensor_type, RoomInfo.room_name, RoomInfo.total_power_consumed FROM SensorData JOIN SensorLocations ON SensorData.id = SensorLocations.sensor_id JOIN RoomInfo ON SensorLocations.room_id = RoomInfo.room_id
SELECT SensorData.sensor_type, EnergyPatterns.analysis_result FROM SensorData JOIN EnergyPatterns ON SensorData.id = EnergyPatterns.pattern_id WHERE SensorData.value > 50
SELECT sensor_type, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_type
SELECT room_name, AVG(total_power_consumed) AS avg_power FROM RoomInfo GROUP BY room_name
SELECT room_name, COUNT(*) AS sensor_count FROM SensorLocations JOIN RoomInfo ON SensorLocations.room_id = RoomInfo.room_id GROUP BY room_name
SELECT SensorData.sensor_type, EnergyConsumption.power_consumed FROM SensorData LEFT JOIN EnergyConsumption ON SensorData.id = EnergyConsumption.sensor_id
SELECT room_name, total_power_consumed FROM RoomInfo WHERE total_power_consumed > 1000

SELECT SensorData.sensor_type, EnergyPatterns.analysis_result, RoomInfo.room_name FROM SensorData JOIN EnergyPatterns ON SensorData.id = EnergyPatterns.pattern_id JOIN SensorLocations ON SensorData.id = SensorLocations.sensor_id JOIN RoomInfo ON RoomInfo.room_id = SensorLocations.room_id
SELECT sensor_type, power_consumed FROM SensorData JOIN EnergyConsumption ON SensorData.id = EnergyConsumption.sensor_id WHERE SensorData.value < 50 AND EnergyConsumption.power_consumed > 100
SELECT SensorData.sensor_type, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM SensorData JOIN SensorLocations ON SensorData.id = SensorLocations.sensor_id GROUP BY SensorData.sensor_type
SELECT SensorData.sensor_type, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM SensorData JOIN SensorLocations ON SensorData.id = SensorLocations.sensor_id GROUP BY SensorData.sensor_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT SensorData.id, SensorData.timestamp, EnergyConsumption.power_consumed FROM SensorData JOIN EnergyConsumption ON SensorData.id = EnergyConsumption.sensor_id ORDER BY SensorData.timestamp DESC
SELECT SensorData.sensor_type, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM SensorData JOIN SensorLocations ON SensorData.id = SensorLocations.sensor_id GROUP BY SensorData.sensor_type
SELECT room_name, SUM(total_power_consumed) AS total_power FROM RoomInfo WHERE room_name LIKE 'Meeting%'
